headline.main: VIERECK IS ARRAIGNED IN CAPITAL COURT; Pleads Not Guilty of Charge of Being Nazi Propagandist

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 10 -- George Sylvester Viereck, accused by the government of being a Nazi propagandist, pleaded not guilty today when arraigned in the Federal District Court on charges of withholding vital information when he registered with the State Department under the Foreign Agents Act.
